Accuracy

Our service runs state-of-the-art atmospheric models. However, as you may have experienced, real world's wind behavior is often very complex and models are limited tools.

That is why Vortex offers you the possibility of performing a quantitative check of the accuracy of our simulations by comparing them against your own wind measurements.

The results of such a comparison, updated live, are presented below thanks to the feedback of our users.

Best reanalysis source (CFSR, MERRA or ERA-I) for SERIES daily correlation against measurements.

SERIES daily correlation against measurements. Downscaling improvement from raw reanalysis.

MAST mean wind speed against measurements.

FARM's Vref against measurements.
